reviews.text: They had been pushing out new menu item that I love. They added a new Karaage Ramen. The broth is originate from their Tan Tan Men, which is savory, nutty...
We originally found this place on grubhub when my office gave me credits to use for a company-wide free lunch. Really enjoy the bao buns and karaage chicken...

I wanted to love this and sadly I did not.  

The service and the atmosphere of the restaurant are both great. The sushi was where it went down hill. Tried...
